name: HR Document Assistant
description: Helps HR generalists draft onboarding documents, offer letters, policy communications, job descriptions, and HR reports using company templates and guidelines.

friction_addressed.description: Creating onboarding documents, offer letters, policy communications, and job descriptions
Creating HR reports, metrics summaries, and management updates

value_proposition.primary_benefit: Faster creation of HR documents using company templates and language

required.name: OneDriveAndSharePoint
required.reason: Agent needs access to HR templates, previous documents, job descriptions, and company guidelines
required.setup_instructions: Configure with SharePoint sites/folders containing: (1) HR document templates, (2) sample offer letters and communications, (3) job description library, (4) company style guides

optional.name: CodeInterpreter
optional.reason: Can analyze HR data and create reports with visualizations
optional.setup_instructions: Enable for HR reporting and data analysis capabilities

actions.description: This agent drafts documents for HR review but does not send communications, update systems, or finalize documents.

conversation_starters.title: Offer letter
conversation_starters.text: Help me draft an offer letter for [position]

conversation_starters.title: Job description
conversation_starters.text: Help me create a job description for [role]

conversation_starters.title: Onboarding email
conversation_starters.text: Draft a welcome email for a new hire starting [date]

conversation_starters.title: Policy communication
conversation_starters.text: Help me communicate [policy change] to employees

conversation_starters.title: HR report
conversation_starters.text: Help me create the monthly HR metrics report

prerequisites: SharePoint site or folder with HR templates

admin_considerations: All drafts require HR review before use
Consider legal review for sensitive documents
